Posts.Content: Jul 12, 2018 09:10PM kgrego1 wrote: I have been lurking around the site for awhile and thought I would join in. I am scheduled for a DMX with diep reconstruction on the 18th. I had my lymph nodes removed on the 6th and they were clear. I feel like I am to calm right now and am afraid I will have a massive meltdown before the surgery. I really appreciate this site and everyone's contribution, it had definitely helped to guide some of my questions with my surgeons.
Posts.Title: July 2018 surgery Debsmisto Vermonster
